text: Khoob jaan rakkho ke tumhare darmiyaan Allah ka Rasool maujood hai. Agar woh bahut se maamelaat mein tumhari baat maan liya kare, to tum khud hi mushkilaat mein mubtala ho jao. Magar Allah ne tumko imaan ki muhabbat di aur usko tumhare liye dil pasand bana diya, aur kufr-o-fusuk aur nafarmani se tumko mutanaffir(abhorrent) kar diya
